rows.label: qst202830_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Menou.
Is there anything we can do for you?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0002
rows.name: Rex? What's this about all of a sudden?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I just thought, you always
look out for us, you know?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0004
rows.name: I'd like to repay the favor somehow.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes, me too!
I'd like to do something nice for you!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0006
rows.name:
Hmm, well... Let's see...
I dunno, you kinda sprung this on me...

rows.label: qst202830_msg0007
rows.name:
It doesn't have to be anything big.
Just give us a hint!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0008
rows.name:
Exactly, mo!
Just think out loud!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0009
rows.name: Right, okay. In that case...

rows.label: qst202830_msg0010
rows.name:
I'd like to find a rare mineral!
Or something.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0011
rows.name: Rare mineral?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0012
rows.name: I'm actually an amateur rock hunter.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0013
rows.name: And, did you know?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0014
rows.name:
When someone discovers a new stone,
they get to name it whatever they want.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0015
rows.name:
I always thought that was neat,
so finding a new type of mineral
is a dream of mine!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0016
rows.name:
Huh!
That's...kinda inspiring.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0017
rows.name:
On the other hand, I can't imagine
discovering a new mineral would be
a simple thing to do...

rows.label: qst202830_msg0018
rows.name:
Naturally!
I know it won't be easy, sure I do.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0019
rows.name:
It's just a dream, a vague hope.
I'm not too hung up on it.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0020
rows.name:
Nah, come on! We can do it!
We can make your dream come true
if we give it our best shot!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0021
rows.name:
Nobody'd ever fulfill their dreams
if we all gave up straight away, right?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0022
rows.name:
Tora agree with boss!
Let's hunt rocks together as team!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0023
rows.name: Thanks so much, you guys!

rows.label: qst202830_msg0024
rows.name: But how we find rare mineral now?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0025
rows.name:
Well, I heard a rumor it's not too hard
to find unusual ore in the Old Quarry
in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202830_msg0026
rows.name:
If it's okay with you guys, why don't
we go and check it out?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0027
rows.name: Sure, why not?

rows.label: qst202830_msg0028
rows.name: Let's go without dilly-dally!
